name: World of Bender
description:
A pixelated adventure where the girl is kidnapped and the protagonist embarks on a rescue adventure to a totally different world. It is a game for which I have in mind an adventure and romance story. Going through beautiful worlds and various scenarios. It is still in the development phase. I would appreciate some donations for the cause. I await your comments.
